name: SRM Institute of Science & Technology
description:
I pursued my Bachelor of Technology (B. Tech), majoring in Information Technology (IT) from SRM IST, formerly known as SRM University. 
 𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐬𝐞𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤: Data structures, Algorithms Design and Analysis, Python, Java, OOP using C++,Linear Algebra, Advanced Calculus, Probability and Queuing Theory, Discrete Mathematics, Computer Architecture, Computer Network, Database Management Systems, Linux Administration
